item.title: Building Blockchain Security at Scale
item.description: After years building AI systems for healthcare and LLMs, I’ve found my most challenging and impactful work yet: blockchain security and compliance at Range.org. The Transition to Blockchain Moving from traditional ML to blockchain required learning entirely new paradigms: Healthcare AI: Structured data, regulated environments, batch processing Blockchain ML: Graph data, pseudonymous actors, real-time requirements The shift wasn’t just technical—it was philosophical. In blockchain, trust is code, and every system must be designed for adversarial environments.
